class.name: Plan
class.brief_description: A class for planning and executing tasks.
class.description: The Plan class provides methods for declaring actions, goals, and tasks, as well as finding and executing plans to achieve those goals. It also supports multi-goal and uni-goal methods.

method.name: find_plan
method.description: Finds a plan to achieve the goals in the todo list from the given state.

method.name: run_lazy_lookahead
method.description: Runs a lazy lookahead search to find a plan, trying up to max_tries times.
